00023     ON_EN_CHANGE( IDC_GPIXFER_EDIT_FILENAME, OnEnChangeGpiFile )

00080 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void CGpiTransferDlg::OnEnChangeGpiFile()
00086 {
00087     BOOL isValid = TRUE;
00088 
00089     UpdateData( TRUE );
00090 
00091     if( mGpiFilePath == "" || mVersion == "" )
00092     {
00093         isValid = FALSE;
00094     }
00095 
00096     if( mVersion.Left( 2 ) == "0x" )
00097     {
00098         if( mVersion.GetLength() > 34 )
00099             isValid = FALSE;
00100     }
00101     else
00102     {
00103         if( mVersion.GetLength() > 16 )
00104             isValid = FALSE;
00105     }
00106 
00107     if( isValid )
00108     {
00109         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00110     }
00111     else
00112     {
00113         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 void CGpiTransferDlg::OnBnClickedFind()
00123 {
00124     TCHAR workingDirectory[200];
00125     // opening a file in another directory changes the current
00126     // directory, which will cause problems because the log and data
00127     // files are opened relative to the current directory.  So, get the
00128     // directory now so that it can be restored when the user is done
00129     // picking a file.
00130     DWORD result = GetCurrentDirectory( 200, workingDirectory );
00131     if( result == 0 || result > 200 )
00132     {
00133         MessageBox( _T("Unable to get current directory"), _T("Severe Error") );
00134         OnCancel();
00135         return;
00136     }
00137     CFileDialog dlg
00138         (
00139         TRUE,
00140         _T("gpi"),
00141         NULL,
00142         OFN_HIDEREADONLY | OFN_OVERWRITEPROMPT,
00143         _T("GPI Files (*.gpi)|*.gpi||")
00144         );
00145     if( dlg.DoModal() == IDOK )
00146     {
00147         mGpiFilePath = dlg.GetPathName();
00148         UpdateData( FALSE );
00149         OnEnChangeGpiFile();
00150     }
00151     if( !SetCurrentDirectory( workingDirectory ) )
00152     {
00153         MessageBox( _T("Unable to set current directory"), _T("Severe Error") );
00154         OnCancel();
00155         return;
00156     }
00157 }    /* OnBnClickedFind() */
00158 
00159 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00167 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 void CGpiTransferDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00169 {
00170     UpdateData( TRUE );
00171     char file[200];
00172 
00173     char    versionString[35];
00174     uint8   version[16];
00175     uint8   versionLength;
00176 
00177     memset( version, 0, sizeof( version ) );
00178     WideCharToMultiByte( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mVersion, -1, versionString, 34, NULL, NULL );
00179     versionString[34] = '\0';
00180 
00181     if( strncmp( versionString, "0x", 2 ) == 0 )
00182     {
00183         versionLength = (uint8)UTIL_hex_to_uint8( versionString + 2, version, 16 );
00184     }
00185     else
00186     {
00187         versionLength = (uint8)minval( 16, strlen( versionString ) );
00188         memmove( version, versionString, versionLength );
00189     }
00190 
00191     WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, mGpiFilePath.GetBuffer(), -1, file, 200, NULL, NULL );
00192     file[199] = '\0';
00193     fstream open_file( file, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in );
00194     if( open_file.good() )
00195     {
00196         open_file.close();
00197         mCom.sendGpiFile( file, versionLength, version );
00198 
00199         CGpiTransferProgressDlg sending_dlg( this, mCom );
00200         sending_dlg.DoModal();
00201     }
00202     else
00203     {
00204         mGpiFilePath += _T(" could not be opened ");
00205         MessageBox( mGpiFilePath, _T("Error!") );
00206     }
00207     open_file.close();
00208     OnOK();
00209 }    /* OnBnClickedOk */
